body:
@ianlancetaylor sounds correct. This is a kernel patched with PaX which has a [randmmap](https://pax.grsecurity.net/docs/randmmap.txt) feature.  Setting pax [softmode](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/PaX#Soft_mode) makes it build.

I also tested go1.7beta1 and it also works like it should.
